mapper.select: SELECT f.family_id, f.family_code, f.family_count, f.family_communication_status FROM family f JOIN family_user fu ON f.family_id = fu.family_id WHERE fu.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT fu.user_id FROM family_user fu JOIN family_user f ON f.family_id = fu.family_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM family_user WHERE family_id = ( SELECT family_id FROM family_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO family(family_code, family_count, family_communication_status, family_created_at) VALUES (#{familyCode}, 1, #{familyCommunicationStatus}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM family_user WHERE family_id = #{familyId} AND user_id = #{userId}
